short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embed Retool apps directly into Chrome's sidebar

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is designed simply to host an iframe with your Retool app embedded inside. The extension can be configured to host an app by name or you can connect to a Retool workflow that provides a list of app names.

The store lists that the extension collects "Authentication information - For example: passwords, credentials, security question, or personal identification number (PIN)" but it does not.

The box for the permission was ticked ~ ONLY ~ because if you want to use a workflow to provide app names, you have to provide your workflow API key. This is authentication information, but it is never transmitted. Your workflow API key is stored in the browser's local storage for use by the extension.
